mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dm SET last_msg = NULL
mapper.select: SELECT A.idm, A.last_msg AS lastMsg, A.last_msg_at AS lastMsgAt , D.nm AS otherPersonNm, D.pic AS otherPersonPic FROM t_dm A INNER JOIN t_dm_user B ON A.idm = B.idm INNER JOIN t_dm_user C ON B.idm = C.idm INNER JOIN t_user D ON C.iuser = D.iuser WHERE B.iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND C.iuser != #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY A.last_msg_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT
A.seq, A.msg, A.created_at AS createdAt , B.iuser AS writerIuser, B.pic AS writerPic FROM t_dm_msg A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.idm = #{idm} ORDER BY A.seq DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}
